Summary: [Some Object] - Error message after adding A.. to meeting

Preconditions.1: At least 1 meeting should be created
Preconditions.2: Login to the UAT org as Business Admin User

Steps to reproduce.4: Click on the +Add on any Participant
Steps to reproduce.7: Click on the Next button again

Actual result: Participant didn't add to the Participans, Error message appears, see Attachments
Expected result: Participant successfully added, no Errors on the Adding page
